sn_aia_usecase.base_plan: This agentic workflow specializes in creating incidents in ServiceNow based on user inputs. 1. Extract the caller's name from the input. 2. Populate the caller's name into the description field of the incident. 3. Create a new incident record in ServiceNow with the provided details. 4. Confirm the successful creation of the incident to the user.
sn_aia_usecase.description: This workflow creates a simple incident in ServiceNow with the caller's name populated in the description field. It is designed for users who need to quickly log incidents with minimal input.
sn_aia_usecase.name: Create Incident Workflow
